name: Bristol Gym Girls
description: A welcoming community for women in Bristol who want to connect with like-minded gym girls. Bristol Gym Girls organizes a monthly social walk followed by coffee and pastries at a local cafe.

events.details: A walk, a chat, and a good pastry — because sometimes that's all you need to reset before a new month begins! Stomp through some Bristol greenery before grabbing a coffee and a catch-up with your favourite gym girls. Exact meet-up location is emailed two days before the event. Open to all Bristol Gym Girls, whether you're brand new or a familiar face. A lot of girls come solo and end up making new friends — it's a laid-back, no-pressure space to connect.

location.details: This location is a nearby placeholder, as the precise meeting point varies around Clifton & the Downs. Participants receive specific location via email before each event, so make sure to sign up on Eventbrite!

cost.details: This event is free. A free coffee is included if you buy any pastry at Catleys Cafe afterwards!

booking.details: Tickets are available on Eventbrite, please see the links above. Make sure to register to receive the event location.
